headline: Federal IT Security Specialist
summary:
Management of Government Certified Data Center (100+ Servers)
Oversight of IT Resources including Workstations, Laptops, Servers, Infrastructure, Security and Telecom.

Oversight of IT procurement with knowledge of emergent technologies and how to leverage them in any environment.

Information Security Manager earning government certification on over 100 separate applications.

Well-versed in IT and IT Security Policy creation and maintenance, generating over 20 different policies and procedures documents being used by multiple departments.

Software experience with a wide variety of programs including: VMWare, Autodesk applications, Microsoft Office, Adobe products, Symantec, Trend Micro Client/Server Security, McAfee AV, etc.

Specialties: Implementing Windows Network Solutions, building and Maintaining Windows Servers.  Troubleshooting systems and network issues (Cisco, Juniper, Fortinet).  IT and Security Convergence

positions.description:
Perform Document Management, Security Assessments and Continuous Monitoring for Sensitive Systems
Authored System Security Plans, Contingency Plans, Incident Response Plans
Work closely with IT Administrators to ensure proper compliance and Risk Mitigation 
Perform weekly Tenable Nessus scans for vulnerability management
positions.title: ISSO

positions.description:
Oversight of Company IT Resources including Workstations, Laptops, Servers, Infrastructure, Security and Telecom.

Full management of a staff of 6, covering Corporate IT, Infrastructure and Information Security

Facilities management of a Company Owned Data Center, including: Power, Cooling, and IT Infrastructure.

Engineered the hosting of over 60 accredited Federal applications at the Data Center, with a development environment of over 300 development applications.

Primary Point of Contact for all Federal Certification and Accreditation efforts regarding application hosting at the company Data Center.

Project management of multiple, concurrent C&A efforts, supervising both senior, mid-level and junior security engineers.

Wrote majority of security documentation for the Data Center, including: System Security Plan, Incident Response Plan, Contingency Plans, Security Policies, etc.

Developed a set of policies and procedures, and evolved that into an overarching IT Handbook, used by all 6 members of the team for reference, and process guidance.

Instituted a bid process for every IT acquisition, allowing vendors to provide the best technology and price given a list of requirements.

Introduced use of emergent technology, increasing performance and reducing costs.

Full management and monitoring of over 150 servers, in Corporate, Development and Production environments.
positions.title: Director, IT Operations

positions.title: IT Systems Manager
